title: Branch change doubt
content: From what ik after first year we can change branch but during branch change which chpa is considered 1 sem or the second sem

comments.body:
Cgpa is cumulative 
For the first year it's average of 1st and 2nd sem,  as they both have the same number of credits
Ohh ok got it thank you
We get scholarship sgpa wise then right
The 40% one is based on sgpa and while the 50 % one is based on cgpa
